content: create varying frill height by creating various single_crochet double_crochet treble quadruple quintuple and sextuple crochets place sextuple crochet over point of tail work gradually to and from sextuple crochet assembly sew thighs to body ~row 30 after thighs are attached attach each foot to bottom of each thigh sew big frills to sides of head centered on the eyes sew small frills directly above and below big frills eye indentation pass thread from back of head through point a insert needle one st to the right of point a push needle through point b insert needle through st to the left of point b bring needle through point c push needle through point d lifting eye so yarn can run underneath it pull needle through point e insert needle into point f lifting eye so yarn can run underneath it push needle through back of head © 2023 pan evers all rights reserved panchetstudio com
